alert.note: Alert for Humphreys; Sharkey; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 3:01PM CDT until April 05 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR EASTERN WASHINGTON...WEST CENTRAL HUMPHREYS AND NORTH CENTRAL SHARKEY COUNTIES... At 300 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hollandale, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Tribbett around 310 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Arcola. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
